conclusion: Need to compare average velocities of Car A and Car B from t=0 to t1 using velocity-time graphs.
Car A starts with velocity v1 and Car B starts with velocity v2.
Average velocity formula: (Final velocity - Initial velocity) / Time.
Final velocity for both cars is v2 at t1.
Average velocity of Car A is (v2 - v1) / t1.
Average velocity of Car B is (v2 - v1) / t1.
During t=0 to t1, average velocity of both cars is the same.
